testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters valid credentials And clicks the login button Then the user should be redirected to the dashboard

testcase.name: Failed login with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters invalid password And clicks the login button Then an error message should be displayed

testcase.name: Account lockout after 3 failed attempts
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user enters wrong password 3 times Then the account should be locked
testcase.failure: Expected account status: LOCKED Actual account status: ACTIVE

testcase.name: Password reset link
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user clicks forgot password And enters their email Then a reset link should be sent

testcase.name: Remember me functionality
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page When the user checks remember me And logs in successfully Then the session should persist for 30 days
